HWA Paramset Config. More...

#include <drivers/hwa/hwa.h>

Detailed Description

HWA Paramset Config.

HWA paramset config parameters that are used with the HWA_ConfigParamSet() call.

Field Documentation

uint8_t HWA_ParamConfig_t::accelMode

2 bit value: See HWA_ACCELMODE macros for correct values. Configures the mode of operation of the accelerator for the current parameter-set. Sets the ACCEL_MODE bits of PARAM1_0

HWA_AccelModeCFAR HWA_ParamConfig_t::cfarMode

CFAR mode related params

HWA_ComplexMultiply HWA_ParamConfig_t::complexMultiply

Complex multiply related params used when HWA_ParamConfig_t::accelMode is not HWA_ACCELMODE_CFAR

HWA_DestConfig HWA_ParamConfig_t::dest

Dest related params

uint8_t HWA_ParamConfig_t::dmaTriggerSrc

DMA channel number to be monitored for dma based trigger mode. this field is used only when HWA_ParamConfig_t::triggerMode is set to HWA_TRIG_MODE_DMA Sets the DMA2ACC_CHANNEL_TRIGSRC bits in PARAM1_0

HWA_AccelModeFFT HWA_ParamConfig_t::fftMode

FFT mode related params

HWA_SourceConfig HWA_ParamConfig_t::source

Source related params

uint8_t HWA_ParamConfig_t::triggerMode

See HWA_TRIG_MODE macros for correct values. Sets the TRIGMODE bits of PARAM1_0
